data.author: Nexworx

changelog.release_notes:
– Timeline pins will no longer misbehave when DST kicks in. The pin engine has been overhauled, and service has been restored.
– Pins will now show times in your preferred time format, whether that's 12h or 24h. Your preference will take effect after opening the Commute app on your Pebble.
– IRL change: Nexworx is now an official business. Stay tuned.
Some additional stability improvements for iOS users.

This is a big one! Enjoy, everyone!
– Pebble timeline integration! Commute will now tell you when you should leave for work in order to arrive on time. Magic! This feature is rolling out gradually to all users.
– Support for Pebble Classic and Pebble Steel watches.
– Performance and stability improvements.
Fixed the app's configuration page on iOS. Sorry about that!

– Commute now shows you the name of the main road along the route you should take.
– Delay duration has moved: press the Select button to toggle between total travel duration and delay duration.
– Option to avoid toll roads, highways and/or ferries. You can enable this in the settings on your phone.
– Squashed some bugs. Enjoy the update!

data.description:
Get live traffic information for your commute at a glance! See how long it'll take you to get from your current location to work or home – including how much you'll be delayed by traffic jams along the way. Better yet: have your watch tell you when to leave for work thanks to Commute's Pebble timeline integration. Magic!

Brought to you with ♥ from the beautiful, traffic-stricken land of Belgium. Traffic data supplied by Google Maps.

latest_release.release_notes:
– Timeline pins will no longer misbehave when DST kicks in. The pin engine has been overhauled, and service has been restored.
– Pins will now show times in your preferred time format, whether that's 12h or 24h. Your preference will take effect after opening the Commute app on your Pebble.
– IRL change: Nexworx is now an official business. Stay tuned.

data.title: Commute
